name: Tile Fortress
description:
You find yourself in a Red Brick Fortress... You must escape.
Use the Arrow Keys, or WASD to move. Try to get to the Yellow Square as Fast as possible. You are the Yellow Circle. DO NOT touch the dark red. The fortress security will get more diverse and challenging the more you travel through it.
Good Luck.
There will be future updates, like new levels, modes, bosses and more. And I possibly might make a sequel if this game does well enough.
I also kind of made this in one day.
